name: Deep Forest
description: A remote and dangerous part of the forest beyond the abandoned logging camp, where something inhuman now lurks, driven by endless hunger.

snapshot.name: Deep Forest
snapshot.location: Deep within the forest beyond the abandoned logging camp
snapshot.description: Far from the logging camp, deep within the forest, something unnatural resides. The forest here is isolated and conceals a horrific presence, making it extremely dangerous for anyone who ventures too far from the path.

characters.name: Gof'en-Hupadego-Shub-Nicholas
characters.notes: Once a wealthy businessman, now transformed into an inhuman abomination, endlessly hungry.

exits.description: The path leading back toward the abandoned logging camp

snapshot.keeperNotes: This location represents a major point of danger and potential confrontation. The creature here should feel overwhelming and alien, emphasizing the consequences of forbidden rituals and transformations.

connections.description: The deep forest can be reached by following the abandoned path from the logging camp
